content.rendered:
Brazilian Hair Relaxing (also known as Brazilian Blowout) is a hair treatment based on keratin protein that naturally straightens your hair.

Is this treatment a relaxer?
No. It is a treatment

What about my regrowth on coloured hair?
No problem. We can either do tint re-growth whilst wearing Latino, or we can do foil highlights or lowlights. However, we do insist on your returning to us for colour whilst wearing our Latino Hair Straightener, otherwise we can not, of course, guarantee our work.

Can you do the treatment on top of relaxed hair?
Yes. You can do the treatment over any previously relaxed hair.

Can you do the treatment on highlighted hair?
Yes. You can do the highlights and do the treatment right after.

Can you do the treatment on virgin hair?
Yes. But it wont last as long as a previously coloured or chemically treated hair.

Can I colour my hair and do the treatment?
Yes. We recommend you colour the hair first.

Can I wash my hair after the treatment, and when?
Yes, but only 3 whole days after you have done the treatment.

Can I wear a ponytail or tie my hair?
No, only 3 days after doing the treatment

What should I do if my hair gets wet during the first 3 days?
Blow dry immediately.

Can I go into the pool or ocean after the treatment?
Yes. But only after 3 days.

How long will the treatment stay on my hair?
It lasts 2 to 4 months depending on the hair type, treatment will work better on a chemically treated hair like coloured or relaxed. On virgin hair the best result will achieved after the second or third application.

What shampoo can I use after doing the treatment?
We recommend using a shampoo that does not contain Sulfate and Sodium Chloride, and it also has UV protection.

Do I have to do touch-ups on my next visit or the whole head?
The whole head.

When should I have the treatment done again?
3 months or as needed.

Can I do the treatment while pregnant or nursing?
It is not recommended.

Can an infant be present while the treatment is being done?
No. Because the smell may irritate the child.

Sound good?  To find out more details visit this page, and to make an appointment at Luxe Chatswood Chase please call us on (02) 9412 1244.
